description:
I met Harley two and a half years ago. I knew he was something special then, and I was right.
I've loved working with Harley and there's a reason that he's been one of our most popular guys. Well, several reasons, actually. Of course, he's hot. Perfect body, big, uncut cock, handsome face, and disarming smile. He's also charming and he has a really fun personality. He's smart and he's talented (and not just with his dick).
Harley has been busy working on his "conventional" modeling career and, believe it or not, he's been trying to break into the music world as well. Plus he's itching to do straight porn and make it big there.
So he and I decided that this would be his last film with us. I'm sad, but I'm also happy for him because I think he will accomplish some pretty neat things.
Of course, I wanted to have one our top studs give him one last good fucking. That's why I picked Matt — he's a muscle stud with a big, long dick. And a great last fuck it was!
Good luck Harley!
title: Harley & Matt
